attributes.action: give CO2 tax rebates for individuals planting native English slow growing trees on their own land or garden.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is keen to tax people on their supposed carbon footprint, so why not give people a tax rebate for planting trees. 

This tax rebate would be based upon type of tree, rate of growth, and number of trees planted. This would make sure that proper slow growing native English trees such as oak were planted, that would survive for hundreds of years.
